metadata.summary: Create global rules that filter out false positive detections from D&R rules using detection metadata and originating event data.
metadata.primary_use_case: Reduce alert noise by suppressing known benign detections based on hostname, file paths, or detection categories

cross_refs.description: False positive rules filter detections from stateful and other D&R rules
False positive rules can filter detections from any target type
Sigma rule detections often require false positive tuning for specific environments
Threat feed detections may generate false positives requiring filtering
